Config Management Camp

5 - 7 February, 2018

Gent, Belgium

Since last Camp

Nick Anderson

3.10.0 had just been released. 3.12.0 should be released by the time we camp. Come review what we have been working on since 3.10.0. Come discuss what's new, what has changed and what you can look forward to for the next LTS release

About Speaker

Nick Anderson has been a core developer of CFEngine for many years, and is a expert in creating policies. With his unique experience and in depth knowledge of CFEngine, Nick has been instrumental in the development of Zener.

State of the CFEngine 2018 from Nick Anderson
